::Slayer::

Slayer growls at the mention of Lunarpine. "If I see him again, I'll 
tear his circuitry out through his audio receptors."

He turns, looking at a map of earth. "Allright, so where will you be 
waiting?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Ignatius's logic told him the former Maximal would attract enough 
attention
> just flying into scanner range but in case he was wrong he'd need 
more
> influence. "Fire off a few missles at the shield and use your lasers 
on
> anything moving outside the base. If that doesn't get thier 
attention then
> they're either dead or deaf." Another factor came to mind. "Oh, if 
you see
> the bot you fought last time avoid him I don't want to have to pick 
up your
> pieces
